WebComics™ presents top-notch and exclusive comics, manga & manhwa from acclaimed creators across the globe. Our all-covered genres cater to your every interest and preference!

description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

Unlock the full potential of your PDF documents with ChatPDF, the ultimate AI-powered chatbot designed to make working with PDFs easier and more efficient. Whether you need to summarize lengthy reports, find specific information quickly, or ask detailed questions about your documents, ChatPDF has got you covered.


Key Features:

- Upload and Chat: Simply upload your PDF file and start chatting with our intelligent assistant.
- Instant Summaries: Get concise summaries of your documents in seconds.
- Detailed Q&A: Ask specific questions about the content and receive accurate answers.
- Contextual Understanding: Benefit from the chatbot's advanced understanding of context to get relevant information.
- Search and Highlight: Easily search for keywords and phrases within your PDF and see them highlighted.
- Multi-Language Support: Communicate with the chatbot in multiple languages for a seamless experience.
- User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a clean, intuitive interface that makes interacting with your PDFs a breeze.


How It Works:

- Upload Your PDF: Drag and drop your PDF file into the app or select it from your device.
- Interact with the Chatbot: Start a conversation with the chatbot by typing your queries.
- Get Instant Responses: Receive accurate and context-aware answers to your questions.


Why ChatPDF?

- Save Time: No more scrolling through endless pages – get the information you need right away.
- Increase Productivity: Focus on what matters by letting ChatPDF handle the heavy lifting.
- Enhance Understanding: Gain better insights into your documents with intelligent summaries and answers.


Use Cases:

- Students: Quickly summarize and understand study materials.
- Professionals: Efficiently review reports, contracts, and research papers.
- Researchers: Extract key information from academic papers and journals.
- Anyone: Make working with PDFs simpler and more enjoyable.


You can subscribe to get unlimited access to certain app features.

- PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION: Subscriptions are billed weekly or yearly.


Download ChatPDF today and transform the way you interact with your PDF documents!

Goojara – The Browser That Knows You Best

The internet should feel simple, fast, and personal. That’s why we built Goojara—a browser designed around you. With privacy at its core, speed in every tap, and a smart hub for all your favorite content—Goojara makes surfing the web effortless and enjoyable.

Key Features

- Zero Footprints. Total Privacy.
Browse like a ghost in full incognito mode. Goojara keeps no traces of your activity, giving you complete control of your digital life.

- Blazing Fast. Always Smooth.
Lightning-speed page loads and seamless navigation keep you moving at the pace of the web—no waiting, no lag.

- Shortcuts That Stick.
Your favorite sites are always just one tap away. Pin Google, YouTube, Instagram, or any site you love for instant access.

- One Hub for Everything You Love.
Video • Entertainment • AI • Sports • Social — all neatly organized in one clean, easy-to-use bookmarks hub.

- Jump Back In, Instantly.
Revisit saved pages and history with intuitive panels built for quick retrieval. No clutter, no confusion—just your web, remembered.

- Weather, Right in Your Browser.
Stay prepared with real-time local weather updates, built directly into Goojara. No extra apps needed.

With Goojara, you’re not just browsing—you’re living smarter, faster, and safer. It’s your web, simplified.

Peech – Turn Anything Into Audiobooks!

Meet Peech, your personal AI-powered reading sidekick that transforms all your text - PDFs, web articles, physical books, and more - into crystal-clear audiobooks. Whether you’re racing through study notes, catching up on blog posts, or diving into that spicy new novel, Peech has you covered.

The Magic of AI Voices
	• Smart Voice Matching: Peech’s advanced AI picks the perfect voice for each genre - whether it’s serious academic reading or a lighthearted romance.
	• Natural & Lifelike: Our voices are so real, you might forget you’re listening to an app.

Effortless Content Scanning
	• Lightning-Fast OCR: Snap a pic of any page or book, and Peech instantly converts it to audio. No more manual typing!
	• Web & PDF Parsing: Just paste a link or upload a file to start listening - perfect for busy pros, students, and anyone who prefers ears over eyes.

Speedy Reading, On-the-Go
	• High-Speed Playback: Devour your favorite content up to 5x faster - perfect for power-learners or those who want to binge-listen on the run.
	• Playlists & Autoplay: Build custom playlists to keep the stories rolling, so you can multitask like a boss.

One App, All Languages
	• Automatic Language Detection: Peech seamlessly identifies and narrates in 60+ languages.
	• Global Accessibility: Great for language learners, busy professionals, and anyone with reading challenges.

Why Peech?
	• Students: Turn textbooks into engaging audio lectures - study smarter, not harder.
	• Busy Professionals: Catch up on news, memos, or trade articles during your commute.
	• Accessibility: An empowering reading solution for users with visual or reading impairments.
	• Content Lovers: From classics to your favorite steamy novels - Peech reads it all.

Free Trials & Subscriptions

Experience Peech with our flexible subscription plans, some offering free trials. Dive into unlimited content and see how Peech revolutionizes your reading routine - no commitment, no hassle.

Ready to transform your reading life? Give Peech a try and unlock the power of AI-driven audio today!

Stay informed with Newsday - South Africa’s trusted source for breaking news, in-depth reporting, and investigative journalism. From major national events to stories that matter in your community, Newsday delivers fast, accurate, and engaging coverage straight to your device.

Created by a small team of passionate journalists, Newsday is committed to telling the stories that shape South Africa - with integrity, depth, and a dedication to the truth. Whether it’s politics, social issues, or groundbreaking investigations, you’ll get the facts you need and the context you deserve.

Key Features:
- Breaking News Alerts: Be the first to know with real-time notifications on major stories.
- Original Reporting: Access exclusive, on-the-ground journalism you won’t find anywhere else.
- In-Depth Coverage: Explore detailed features and investigations on the issues affecting South Africa today.
- Community Interaction: Share your thoughts and join the conversation with reader comments.

Download Newsday today and stay connected to South Africa’s most important stories - wherever you are.

BW News

BW News is a one-stop shop for Botswana’s leading newspapers. Start reading the print editions of Mmegi, Botswana Guardian, The Midweek Sun and The Monitor, as they appear in the paper.
 
Newspapers on the BW News:
 
1. Mmegi – news you need to know. 
Mmegi [The Reporter] is the leading independent source of breaking news, latest news, current affairs, Politics, Business, Sport, debates, analysis, and entertainment news in Botswana. It is published by Dikgang Publishing Company
 
2. Botswana Guardian – Fearless and Responsible.
The Botswana Guardian is an English language weekly newspaper published in Gaborone. The paper was started in 1982. It is published by CBET Ltd. on Thursdays.
 
3. The Midweek Sun – Exciting & Revealing
Is the sister publication to the Botswana Guardian and publishes every Wednesday.
 
4. The Monitor
Is the sister publication to Mmegi and publishes every Monday.

description:

Download the WSJ App Today

Staying ahead of the competition means staying up to date with the facts. Get the trusted insights, in-depth analysis and real-time updates you need from the WSJ App.

AI Fact Checker App: Verify News & Expose Fake Stories

AI Fact Checker is designed to help you cut through misinformation. In just seconds, you can verify news headlines, check social media posts, and review breaking stories with AI-powered analysis and transparent sources.

What You Can Do Inside The App

- Check headlines: Quickly fact check news articles and breaking updates.
- Review social media: Analyze viral tweets, TikToks, Reddit threads, and more.

- Verify science & health: Distinguish peer-reviewed facts from clickbait claims.

- Understand bias: See political lean (left, center, right) and reliability of each source.
- Debunk fake news: Identify false or misleading stories before they spread.


Key Features Of The AI Fact Checker App

- AI Analysis: Fast verdicts on claims, True, Partly True, or False.
- Breaking News Mode: Stay updated with real-time claim checking.

- History & Sharing: Save fact checks and share results with others.

- Multilingual Support: Works for claims in English, French, German, Dutch, and more.
- Multi-Source Verification: Results drawn from outlets such as BBC, Reuters, AP, and Snopes.
- Bias & Transparency Tools: Visual indicators show bias and trust level.
- Dark Mode so you can factcheck with ease in the night!
- See what other people have fact checked and also see the summary of it.
- Having trouble reading? You can adjust the font sizes in the app!
- Share and save you favourite Factchecks as a PNG file.


Why We Do What We Do

Fake news spreads faster than facts. With AI Fact Checker, you can stay ahead of misinformation, gain clarity on breaking events, and make decisions based on trustworthy information.
Download AI Fact Checker now and get the truth, when it matters most!

The New Yorker app is your digital destination for in-depth reporting, political and cultural commentary, fiction, and humor from New Yorker staff writers and contributors around the world.

Stay up to date. 
Read or listen to top stories from your favorite writers, every day. Turn on notifications so you never miss an important story or your favorite topic. 

Be transported.
News and politics. Books and culture. Fiction and poetry. Discover rich storytelling and rigorous reporting that will sweep you away and introduce you to something new. 

Go about your day.
When your hands are full, listen to featured stories read by world-class narrators. If you need a break, solve a crossword puzzle or Name Drop quiz, and flip through a nearly endless supply of cartoons. And, when you’re on the go, save stories to access them on any device, even offline.

The app is free to download. Subscribers receive unlimited access. Most current New Yorker subscribers have unlimited access to the app as part of their existing subscription. Subscribers with a print-only subscription may not have unlimited access. App subscribers have full access to the Web site, including the archive and most recent issue. Users who have trouble accessing stories can e-mail apps@newyorker.com for assistance. 

Non-subscribers may access the app by starting a free trial. A subscription costs $11.99 a month or $119.99 annually, and includes a 7-day free trial, after which it will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and will state the cost of renewal. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user, and auto-renewal may be turned off by updating the user’s App Store Subscription settings after purchase. Payment will be charged to iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.

Information about our Terms of Service & Privacy Policy can be found at http://www.condenast.com/privacy-policy.
